header.title: It takes 7 seconds to make a good impression
header.text: I design and code beautiful simple things, and I love what I do.

about_block.design_text: I create design products with unique ideas.
about_block.development_text: I develop Front-end with super smooth coding.
about_block.title: Hello, I'm Laura Janssens
about_block.subtitle: Design is not just what it looks like. Design is how it works!
about_block.text_one: I love making things look pretty and more user-friendly with the quote in mind “Less is more“. I am a junior Front-end developer with a UI/UX design background. I had a two year amazing expierce at Take The Lead were I learned so much. Now I'm looking for the next oppurtunity to improve an show-off my skills.
about_block.text_two: I am a team player, focused and a bit of a perfectionist in the world of design. I work best under stress and constantly challenge my skills.

software_block.title: Softwares I know
software_block.text: Here are a couple of softwares I have learned to work with over the years.
